Q_DESC:
The Monk is trying to explain to its users that even a single day can be extremely important and to demonstrate this particular fact he gives them a challenging task.                           He wants to explain the no of days left for the users to complete a task based on current month. The input is the month of the date as integer. He wants to analyze problems based on the no of days of that month. He knows only to use LOGICAL OPERATORS - OR,NOT and AND operators.  Help him to write a C code to complete the task                           Input format:
The first line of input contains one positive integer N,                                        
 if    0N=12 , print thenumber of days else print Invalid input                      
 if  N is 2, print 28 or 29                                                                                           
The second line contains the days in of the  month.
